AssetClass.title: Asset Class
AssetClass.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #2

InstrumentType.title: Instrument Type
InstrumentType.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #1

UseCase.title: Product
UseCase.description: Unique label that defines the product

Level.description: Label assigned to the UPI to describe its level in the hierarchy
Level.title: Level

Underlying.title: Underlier Type
Underlying.description: Indicates the type of underlying asset or entity on which the product is based.

UnderlierIDSource.title: Underlier ID Source
UnderlierIDSource.description: The origin, or publisher, of the associated underlier ID.

UnderlierID.title: Underlier ID
UnderlierID.description: An identifier that can be used to determine the asset(s), index (indices) or benchmark underlying a contract or, in the case of a foreign exchange derivative, identification of the currency pair or index

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Value
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.description: Tenor value of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Unit
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.title: Underlying Credit Index Series
UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.description: The series identifier of a credit default swap index

UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.title: Underlying Credit Index Version
UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.description: The version of a credit default swap index annex

UnderlierIDSource.title: Underlier ID Source
UnderlierIDSource.description: The origin, or publisher, of the associated underlier ID.

UnderlierID.title: Underlier ID
UnderlierID.description: An identifier that can be used to determine the asset(s), index (indices) or benchmark underlying a contract or, in the case of a foreign exchange derivative, identification of the currency pair or index

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Value
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermValue.description: Tenor value of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.title: Underlying Instrument Index Term Unit
UnderlyingInstrumentIndexTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the underlying reference rate

UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.title: Underlying Credit Index Series
UnderlyingCreditIndexSeries.description: The series identifier of a credit default swap index

UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.title: Underlying Credit Index Version
UnderlyingCreditIndexVersion.description: The version of a credit default swap index annex

UnderlyingIssuerType.title: Underlying Issuer Type
UnderlyingIssuerType.description: The underlying issuer type as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015)

DeliveryType.title: Delivery Type
DeliveryType.description: The Delivery Type as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015)

elaboration.CASH: the discharge of an obligation by payment or receipt of a net cash amount instead of payment or delivery by both parties
elaboration.PHYS: the meeting of a settlement obligation under a derivative contract through the receipt or delivery of the actual underlying instrument(s) instead of through cash settlement
elaboration.OPTL: an independently administered synthetic auction process on a set of defined deliverable obligations that sets a reference final price that can be used to facilitate cash settlement of all covered transactions following a credit event
